name: n8n-agentic-commerce-plugins
description: A collection of n8n nodes for agentic commerce workflows

scripts.n8n:link: cd nodes/example-commerce-node && npm link && cd ~/.n8n/custom && npm link n8n-nodes-example-commerce
scripts.n8n:link:a2a: cd nodes/a2a-agent-card-node && npm link && cd ~/.n8n/custom && npm link n8n-nodes-a2a-agent-card
scripts.n8n:link:eip712: cd nodes/eip712-signer-node && npm link && cd ~/.n8n/custom && npm link n8n-nodes-eip712-signer
